text: The 2014 World Sambo Championships was held in Narita, Japan between the 20 and 24 November 2014. This tournament included competition in both Sambo, and Combat Sambo. ==Medal overview== ===Combat Sambo Events=== {| |- |rowspan=2| Half-flyweight (52 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-
